data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Afyon.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Afyon, Turkey
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Afyon, Turkey the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.section_summary: On average, 43 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Afyon, Turkey.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, encourage your church in Afyon that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 265 believers find a person of peace today among the 706,834 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Romani, Domari people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
God, we pray for the believers in Afyon, Turkey that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Afyon, Turkey. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Afyon to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
